participant_1.background:
A blue whale once swam past my boat.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
i enjoy jazz music.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.

participant_2.background:
I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.
i am on a diet.
i love hiking and staying fit.
I sometimes cuss in my videos because I think it makes them more entertaining, but I know that it's not appropriate for everyone.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing pretty good! Just got back from a long hike.
That sounds fun! I love hiking. Where did you hike?
I hiked in the mountains near my house. It was beautiful.
I love the mountains! I went snorkeling in the ocean the other day and it was amazing.
That sounds really cool! I've never been snorkeling before.
It's so much fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love watching astronomy documentaries and reading about space. I also enjoy hiking and staying fit.
That's awesome! I love watching documentaries too. I'm actually really interested in space.
Me too! It's so fascinating to me.
Yeah, it's amazing to think about how big and vast the universe is.
It really is. I love learning about all the different planets and stars.
Me too! I'm actually planning on going to see a planetarium show later this week.
That sounds really cool! I've never been to a planetarium show before.
You should definitely go! It's really fun and informative.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
